---
title: "Simple Plot Example"
output: html_document
---

```{r, echo=FALSE}
# Load the ggplot2 library
library(ggplot2)

# Create some sample data
data <- data.frame(
  x = c(1, 2, 3, 4, 5),
  y = c(2, 3, 5, 7, 8)
)

# Create the plot using ggplot
plot <- ggplot(data, aes(x = x, y = y)) +
  geom_point()

# Display the plot
print(plot)
